meanings.definition: Having or giving off a smell.
meanings.sent1: The odoriferous flowers filled the room with their sweet scent.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was filled with the odoriferous aroma of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The odoriferous cheese made everyone in the room wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The odoriferous perfume was like a bouquet of flowers in a bottle.
meanings.sent5: The odoriferous garbage bin outside the house attracted many flies.

meanings.definition: Emitting a pleasant or strong smell.
meanings.sent1: The odoriferous herbs in the garden were used to make delicious tea.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sold odoriferous cinnamon rolls that were a customer favorite.
meanings.sent3: The odoriferous candles lit up the room with a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The odoriferous incense filled the temple with a sense of peace and tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The odoriferous soap left a refreshing scent on the skin after a shower.
